definition: to cover up (a shortcoming)/to screen off/to hide/to conceal
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: Can even be used as a sun shield for stroller.
sentences.chinese: 甚至可以作爲一個嬰兒車遮陽板使用。

sentences.english: Position sun visors on the roof lining and tighten with the fastening screws.
sentences.chinese: 將遮陽板放在車頂襯裏上並用緊固螺釘擰緊。
